long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Amazon India discounts finder extension. This will help you to find the best discounts on Amazon India (amazon.in). There is minimum discount is 50% and maximum discount you can find is 99%.

üî• Key Features:
-Smart Deal Detection: Automatically scans and finds products with significant discounts (50% or more off)
-Multi-Category Search: Search for deals across 30+ categories including:
-Advanced Sorting Options: (Sort by highest discounts,  Price (Low to High), Price (High to Low), Newest Arrivals, Customer Reviews, Relevance)
-Real-Time Updates: Instantly see deals as they're discovered with a live progress tracker
-Easy Sharing: Share amazing deals directly with friends and family via: (WhatsApp, Twitter, Facebook)
-User-Friendly Interface: (Clean, intuitive design, Quick category filtering, Pagination for easy browsing)
-Clear price comparisons (original vs. discounted)

üí° How It Works:
Select your preferred category (or search all categories)
Click "Find Deals" to start scanning
Watch as the best discounts appear in real-time
Sort and filter to find exactly what you're looking for
Click any deal to go directly to Amazon.in
Share great finds with your network

üõ°Ô∏è Privacy & Security:
No personal data collection
Works directly with Amazon's official API
Requires minimal permissions

Note: This extension is not affiliated with Amazon.in. As an Amazon Associate, we earn from qualifying purchases.
